The Student Centers has several meeting rooms to choose from for your event. SCE has 17 meeting rooms, SCW has 12 meeting rooms and SSB has 3 meeting rooms that can be configured to an assortment of diagrams to meet your needs. Contact Meetings & Conferences to reserve a space today.Â Event Coordinators are standing by to help make your special event spectacular.             Student Center East  We invite you to host your event or meeting with us. Learn More             Student Center West  We invite you to host your event or meeting with us.
